snippet.title: Hades - v1.0 Gameplay Showcase
snippet.description:
Our god-like rogue-like dungeon crawler has come a long way during its Early Access development! See what's in store in the complete v1.0, now available on Nintendo Switch and PC!

Play Hades on Switch:  http://supergiant.games/hadesswitch
Play Hades on Steam: http://supergiant.games/hadessteam
Play Hades on Epic: http://supergiant.games/hadesegs
Get the full OST at: http://store.supergiantgames.com/
